name: Bonehead (itch)
description:
Bonehead: Battle the great slime to return to your gravestone and rest. This game is a top down shooter with a little twist. It's sure to get your bones rattling as you narrowly avoid evil threats and take "Using your head" to a whole new meaning!

Good luck! You're gonna need it!

Controls:

W A S D to move. Left Click to throw your head. Your head goes wherever the cursor is. The Cursor is also your life bar. If it ever hits 0, you lose. When this occurs, press R to restart the game.

Team Players/Gamers:

-Steven Eerkes as Main Coder and Artist
-Oren Goodin as Spriter
-Cobi Bullen as Back-up Coder and Sound Design
-Darius Guidry as Music Composer, Secondary Sound Design, and Web Page Duty
